item.resourceful_tools.hand_tiller.line1: Used to obtain resources from Clay and Gravel
item.resourceful_tools.hook_knife.line1: Used to get string from Sheep without harming
item.resourceful_tools.hook_knife.line2: Use on wool blocks to drop string
item.resourceful_tools.hand_pick.line1: Used to obtain resources from several types of stones
item.resourceful_tools.hand_scrapper.lin: Used on Bamboo to make sheets
item.resourceful_tools.tree_trimmer.line: Used to obtain resources from leaves and sea plants
item.resourceful_tools.springs.general.l: Right-click on block with empty bucket
item.resourceful_tools.wellspring.line1: An endless source of fresh, clean water
item.resourceful_tools.lavaspring.line1: An endless source of piping hot lava
